pages.title: Immersive Cables
pages.text: Immersive Cables aims to bridge Immersive Engineering & Refined storage by allowing storage networks to use Immersive Engineering cables for power.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: Refined Fiber wire works like any other wire, but can be connected up to refined storage tech.$(br2)Refined Fiber wire has a max range of 16 blocks.$(br)Recipe can use any type of stick, not just treated ones.

pages.title: Relay & Transformer
pages.text: $(l)Relays$()can only connect to other transformers via wire; Don't connect to cabling or machines; Allows multiple wire connections.$(br)Relays have a power drain of 2 RS/t each$(br2)$(l)Transformers$()Connect network cabling or machines on their bottom side to your wiring network; Doesn't allow multiple wire connections.$(br)Transformers have a power drain of 12 RS/t each.
Required for use in transformer recipes, can also be placed as decoration.
The alternate recipe mentioned for Refined wire coils.
